title: Forestry Service
description: Clear all monsters in one of the forest areas.

title: Ascension
description: All allied heroes must be level 3.

title: Enchanted
description: All allied heroes must have at least 1 enchantment affecting them.

title: Troll Hunter
description: Defeat the troll boss in the middle of the map.

title: Blood Lust
description: All 3 enemy heroes must be waiting to respawn.

title: United We Stand
description: All allied heroes must be adjacent to one another.

title: Storm the Gate
description: All allied heroes must be in the same lane as each other.

title: Hold the Line
description: All allied heroes must be standing in different lanes.

title: Hired Hand
description: Kill an allied hero with one of your team's heroes.

title: Exorcist
description: Clear one camp of ghosts from the forests.

title: Task Master
description: Use more than one Consumable/Action item on a single turn.

title: Spell Weaver
description: Cast more than one Consumable/Action spell on a single turn.

title: Unstoppable
description: One of your heores must slay two enemy heroes without dying.

title: Slaughter the Weak
description: Kill more than one hero in a single hero's turn.

title: Arachnodphobia
description: Clear one group of spiders in either forest.

title: Lessons Learned
description: All heroes must be standing in different lanes.

title: Exorcist
description: Clear ghosts from both forests.

title: Silent Night
description: Cast no spells during each of your allied hero's turns.

title: Another Round!
description: Use 3 potions in one turn.

title: Revenge
description: Kill an enemy hero who most recently slayed an ally.
